update ym_zhima
per_id = #{perId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zm_score = #{zmScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creation_user = #{creationUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ym_zhima set per_id = #{perId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zm_score = #{zmScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_user = #{creationUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from ym_zhima where per_id = #{per_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
